General.Name: Shenzhen Sed Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen SED Industry Co., Ltd. provides digital and information, and industrial services. It offers cloud computing and storage, data innovation, digital government and industry digital, high-tech industry engineering, digital infrastructure, and smart heating services. The company also provides logistics services, such as transportation and air and sea freight forwarding services. In addition, it engages in the import and export, and properties leasing business. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Sangda Science and Technology Building, Beijing, China, 518057
